Methods.method_description:
Create a new TransformerConfigurationException with no
 detail message.

params.param_description: The error message for the exception.

Methods.method_description:
Create a new TransformerConfigurationException with
 the String  specified as an error message.

params.param_description:
The exception to be encapsulated in a
 TransformerConfigurationException.

Methods.method_description:
Create a new TransformerConfigurationException with a
 given Exception base cause of the error.

params.param_description:
The exception to be encapsulated in a
      TransformerConfigurationException

Methods.method_description:
Create a new TransformerConfigurationException with the
 given Exception base cause and detail message.

params.param_description: The locator object for the error or warning.

Methods.method_description:
Create a new TransformerConfigurationException from a message and a Locator.

 
This constructor is especially useful when an application is
 creating its own exception from within a DocumentHandler
 callback.

params.param_description:
The error or warning message, or null to
                use the message from the embedded exception.
The locator object for the error or warning.

Methods.method_description: Wrap an existing exception in a TransformerConfigurationException.
